features: 💚 𝗦𝗢𝗢𝗧𝗛𝗘 & 𝗕𝗥𝗜𝗚𝗛𝗧𝗘𝗡 𝗬𝗢𝗨𝗥 𝗖𝗢𝗠𝗣𝗟𝗘𝗫𝗜𝗢𝗡: Our gentle wash-off cleanser uses a mild cleansing agent made from coconuts to remove sebum, makeup, and product build-up. Antioxidant vitamins C and E work in synergy to boost radiance, while natural botanicals reduce the apprarance of irritation.
💕 𝟳 𝗦𝗞𝗜𝗡 𝗕𝗘𝗡𝗘𝗙𝗜𝗧𝗦: Our cleanser effectively cleanses, purifies, softens, hydrates, soothes, nourishes, and adds radiance.

🎖️ 𝗦𝗞𝗜𝗡-𝗞𝗜𝗡𝗗 𝗖𝗟𝗘𝗔𝗡𝗦𝗘𝗥 + 🍃 𝗦𝗢𝗢𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗡𝗚 𝗕𝗢𝗧𝗔𝗡𝗜𝗖𝗔𝗟𝗦: Our formula cleanses deeply, with added jojoba and rosehip oil to keep skin moisturized. Antioxidant vitamins C and E brighten your complexion. After 6 weeks, 98% said their skin felt soothed, and 91% saw more radiance.

💚 𝗖𝗟𝗘𝗔𝗡𝗦𝗘 + 𝗚𝗟𝗢𝗪: Our facial cleanser is aloe vera-based to prevent any skin irritation. It's also formulated with antioxidant-rich green tea and rosehip extracts. Green tea is known to fight the appearance of inflammation, and rosehip is loved for its ability to nourish and retain moisture.

🧑‍🔬 𝗗𝗘𝗥𝗠𝗔𝗧𝗢𝗟𝗢𝗚𝗜𝗦𝗧 𝗧𝗘𝗦𝗧𝗘𝗗 𝗢𝗡 𝗔𝗟𝗟 𝗦𝗞𝗜𝗡 𝗧𝗬𝗣𝗘𝗦 & 𝗧𝗢𝗡𝗘𝗦: Focusing on natural ingredients, we’ve created a dermatologist-backed vegan and cruelty-free face wash for all skin types and tones. Our face wash is designed for sensitive skin and does not contain any synthetic fragrances or colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love it! Takes very little amount to cleanse my face, neck, and declotaug. Very gentle to my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle yet effective!
reviews.reviewText: I only have one caution to add about the product. Carefully squeeze out into your hand. It comes out in a ball shape and if you put it on your fingers, it can quickly and easily slide right off into the sink.It lathers just the right amount and rinsed easily.My skin feels smooth, soft and clean after using. It is gentle yet my skin feels very clean after using!Give it a try! It is priced well and really works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very amazing product, don't leave your skin feeling dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my complexion.
reviews.reviewText: I am 73 years old and I use this product at least twice a week with a battery powered complexion brush as I shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's OK. It gets my face clean. The consistency is a thick gel and it requires water to suds up. I find that it works best if i emulsify it between my hands until i get a foam. The thick gel texture can roll off your hands if your not careful. It takes a lot of water to wash off.I don't like the bottle because it's hard to open. I actually got a little scrape on my finger from opening the bottle everyday.The smell is nice and light. It leaves my face feeling clean. It's a relatively small bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite cleaner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used this for a bit over a week twice a day. I always moisturized after. At first my skin started drying out all over. Then my lower cheeks got a tiny bit red with texture. I aslo started getting a sore by my lips. If you've ever been allergic to a toothpaste or lip product, you know the type. I wanted to like this as it lathered nice with such a small amount. My negative symptoms improved after I discontinued. I used nothing else new during this period so it was definitely this :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I love this line of skin care. Fair prices and effective products. I have very sensitive skin and prone to acne. This cleanser does not dry out my skin and it feels great. Will definitely buy again.
Très bon produit je utilise ce efficace

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice product, works well and is good for sensitive skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had just come back from a camping holiday and this cleanser was greeting me at the door. Feeling tired and dishevelled I didn't expect much from a cleanser. However, it's so thick and creamy it was the most luxurious morning wash I have ever had! Love how soft and smooth my skin feels afterwards, it's early days but at the moment this is a keeper in my eyes. Thanks Eclat and Amazon for swift delivery!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: very gentle and soft cleanser! Bought for 10 year old whose skin has started to show signs of hormones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As an older lady I have been looking for a face wash that is both brightening, cleansing without being harsh. I've been using this for three days and have just been told my skin looks amazing & bright and she didn't know I had been using anything.
